entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is a large half-giant who is described as cuddling Hagrid. He is given a wide berth by the crowd due to his size.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for being kind and gentle. He is currently grieving and has howls of grief echoing across the water.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's best friends and is part of the trio that accompanies Harry on his journey. He is mentioned as saying 'We'll be there, Harry'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another member of the trio and is known for being intelligent and resourceful. She mentions that they have had time to turn back if they wanted to.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location mentioned as a destination for Harry, Ron, and Hermione's journey.

entities.name: bill and fleur's wedding
entities.description: Bill and Fleur's wedding is an event that Ron mentions as a reason to visit his parents' house before continuing their journey.

relationships.description: Ron offers to accompany Harry on his journey, saying 'We'll be there, Harry.'
Hermione mentions that they have had time to turn back if they wanted to, showing her supportive nature towards Harry.
Ron mentions Godric's Hollow as a destination for their journey.
Bill and Fleur's wedding is mentioned as an event that will take place at Ron's parents' house.
